name: Jade & the Dark Journey: Volume One
name_original: Jade & the Dark Journey: Volume One
description:
The year is 2010. 14-year-old Jade Chan has begun studying magic under her great-uncle's former apprentice, Tohru, and her idol and uncle Jackie Chan, world-famous archaeologist and adventurer, is left forlorn at how fast she is growing up. 

One day, after awakening from an unsettling dream, Jade makes a strange discovery in Uncle's Rare Finds...

Jade and the Dark Journey is an exploration and story-based fangame for the Jackie Chan Adventures cartoon, made in RPGMaker VX Ace.
